responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I can guide you through troubleshooting

1.show running-config <- To display the configuration that is currently running on the ASA 
 2.show configuration <-To display the saved configuration in flash memory on the ASA. 
 3.show running-config access-group<-To display the access-group. 
 4.show running-config aaa <- Displays the AAA configuration.

1.Moving from TMSH to Bash:root@F5(Active)(tmos)# run util bash. 
 2.Moving from Bash to TMSH:root@F5:Active] log #tmsh. 
 3.view system version and hotfix detailed information: show sys version detail. 
 4.view system version and hotfix summary information: show sys version. 
 5.General system configuration: show sys

1.Show history: Show previously entered commands, 
 2.Show uptime: Displays elapsed time since last boot, 
 3.Show version: Show software version, 
 4.Show stack:Show the stack status of this switch, 
 5.Show modules:Show installed modules information 
 
  https://networkchefbd.com/show-commands/

1.show system nexthops: shows next hops are reachable or not, 
 2.ping x.x.x.x -I lan0 : used to ping any from a particular interface, 
 3.sho int tunnel summary : It shows all the tuunels formed by sdwan

show ip bgp [summary] : Shows Neighors IP and state. 
 2.show ip bgp neighbors: shows all BGP neighors. 
 3.show ip route [bgp]: Show all recieved BGP routes.

feature sflow 
 sflow collector-ip 10.254.99.140 vrf default 
 sflow collector-port 9995 
 sflow agent-ip 10.254.33.10 
 sflow data-source interface Ethernet1/41 
 sflow sampling-rate 5000 
 sflow counter-poll-interval 20

1. show aaa-server :To verify the radius server status. 
 2. sh vpn-sessiondb anyconnect : It Will show all users active connection. 
 3. sh vpn-sessiondb summury : It will show summary of total active connection. 
 4.sh run tunnel-group : It will show all tunnel group profile configured on AnyConnect gateway,You can see all tunnel group. 
 5.sh run group-policy: It will show group policy configured on Gateway. 
 6.sh crypto ca certificate Name: It will show all detail of cert.
